column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////3) food quality- the base ingredients
column2: including the broth is decent; however
column3: instead of bringing out the simple beauty of Ramen
column4: they make almost all of them too salty and spicy. The cuts of meat are 75% fat
column5: and the egg in Ramen 1 is clearly marinated and not freshly boiled; seaweeds are dipped on the side as whole slices.
